price: 15. Waxayse ka yeelaan qayb ka mid ah addoomihiisa (shariigyo la wadaaga Alle cibaadada)5; Hubaal Aadmigu waa abaal darane caddaysatay.
arabic: وَجَعَلُواْ لَهُۥ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ جُزۡءًاۚ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَكَفُورٞ مُّبِينٌ
footnotes: 5. Iyagoo ku andacooda inuu Alle s.w.t. leeyahay wiil ama gabdho. Arrinkanna kuma habboona Alle, waayo waa Keli aan wax shariik ah lahayn iyo xaas iyo ilmo midna.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalū lahu min ʿibādihi juz'an inna al-insāna lakafūrun mubīnun
